revision.text: http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC2689604/ Un intervalle de confiance qui couvre 99% de la distribution d'Ã©chantillonnage, ce qui signifie qu'il existe un risque de faux positif de 1% (erreur de type I). a confidence interval which covers 99% of the sampling distribution, meaning that there is a 1% risk of false positive (type I error) Alejandra Gonzalez-Beltran Jean-Marc Meunier Orlaith Burke Philippe Rocca-Serra confidence interval at 1% of type I error rate STATO is a subclass from http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/STATO_0000196
